video.title: Kitchen Crashers
video.synopsis: At DIY stores around the country, designer Alison Victoria recruits eager homeowners and turns their drab, outdated kitchens into modern gems.

episodes.synopsis: Alison and Chris get to work on a 1920s home in Florida, transforming a master bedroom into a kitchen with custom pieces and high-end appliances.
episodes.title: Blog Cabin 2014 Kitchen Crash

episodes.synopsis: Alison changes the layout of a galley kitchen by moving the sink under a window and adds ceiling-height cabinets and smudge-proof appliances.
episodes.title: Bringing Black Back

episodes.synopsis: An island with gypsum tiles is the centerpiece of an updated kitchen that also features a colorful backsplash and banquette seating.
episodes.title: Mid Century Modern Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison and the crew take on an ambitious renovation that includes adding new floors and cabinets along with custom features like a sliding barn door.
episodes.title: Gigantic Blue Island Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison revamps a cramped kitchen by knocking down a wall and adds rustic touches like a reclaimed wood floor and gray-washed cabinets.
episodes.title: Modern Meets Rustic Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Urban couple Jess and Tom have been using their deck as a dining space. Alison spruces it up with new cabinets, open shelving and a bar.
episodes.title: Decked Out Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison and the crew turn a boring backyard into a cozy outdoor kitchen and dining space complete with a patio and two kitchen islands.
episodes.title: Rustic Outdoor Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison and the team overhaul a couple's urban backyard to create an outdoor kitchen with fun features like a porch swing and an herb garden.
episodes.title: Two Grills Are Better than One

episodes.synopsis: Alison and the crew transform a fireplace into a custom pizza oven, setting the stage for a fun, spacious kitchen with updated decor.
episodes.title: Pizza Oven Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison overhauls a dingy kitchen, adding custom reclaimed pieces in addition to all-new cabinets, countertops and an island.
episodes.title: Farmhouse Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison revamps the layout of an old kitchen, then adds modern touches like glossy neon green cabinets and white quartz countertops.
episodes.title: Modern Kitchen Makeover

episodes.synopsis: Alison and her team create a spacious Japanese-style kitchen for a couple that loves to entertain friends and eat sushi.
episodes.title: Fishy Sushi Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Alison transforms a shipping container into an outdoor kitchen that's perfect for parties, featuring a bar, a smoker and picnic tables.
episodes.title: Shipping Container Kitchen
